mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file(uuid, save_dir, file_name, file_type, file_size, pno, main_image) VALUES(#{uuid}, #{saveDir}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{pno}, #{mainImage})
mapper.select: SELECT f.uuid, f.save_dir, f.file_name, f.pno FROM file f JOIN product p ON f.pno = p.pno WHERE f.main_image = 1 ORDER BY p.pno DESC LIMIT 10
